text: The Last Picture Show is a 1971 American drama movie directed by Peter Bogdanovich and based on the novel of the same name by Larry McMurtry. It stars Jeff Bridges, Timothy Bottoms, Cybill Shepherd, Ellen Burstyn, Ben Johnson, Cloris Leachman, Eileen Brennan, Clu Gulager, Randy Quaid. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for 8 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1972. It was followed up by Texasville in 1990. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1971 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Bogdanovich Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Obscenity controversies Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies featuring a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award-winning performance Category:Movies set in Texas Category:English-language movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:American coming-of-age movies
title: The Last Picture Show
